attributes.action: Allow Catholic adoption agencies the right to not place children with gay couples
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For Catholic adoption agencies to not be exempt from having to place children with gay couples contradicts the Catholic faith.  Catholic adoption agencies should be merely allowed to refer gay couples to other agencies.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
